participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Reflective and mature for his age, Alex often thinks deeply about his future and personal circumstances.
participant_1.background: i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Brave and determined, Jordan is focused on his military career and has a strong sense of duty.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.
